plot: An expedition through Berlin at nighttime, a Berlin one usually doesn't perceive. This approach to dealing with public space opens the view to discover something new in the known. Berlin from a different perspective.
title: Die neonorangene Kuh
plot_es: An expedition through Berlin at nighttime, a Berlin one usually doesn't perceive. This approach to dealing with public space opens the view to discover something new in the known. Berlin from a different perspective.
plot_en: An expedition through Berlin at nighttime, a Berlin one usually doesn't perceive. This approach to dealing with public space opens the view to discover something new in the known. Berlin from a different perspective.
